#### Additional Resources

##### Main Textbooks
- **Mitzenmacher & Upfal**: [*Probability and Computing: Randomization and Probabilistic Techniques in Algorithms and Data Analysis*](https://www.cambridge.org/core/books/probability-and-computing/3A5B47DB315FC64B9256C5C8131C5EFA) - Cambridge University Press
